item.title: Building a Dynamic GitHub Portfolio with AI and Automation (with Code)
item.description: I embarked on a project to create a dynamic and informative portfolio for my GitHub repositories. My goal was to automatically generate concise and engaging descriptions for each project, and then store those descriptions in a JSON file, ready to be used on a portfolio website.
